title: Chomsky - 2003-07-14 - Language and the Mind Revisited - The Biolinguistic Turn
description:
Be sure to pick 720p for best sound and video quality.
On July 14, 2003, Noam Chomsky gave presentation, with Q&A on the topic: Language and the Mind Revisited - The Biolinguistic Turn


I de-noised and lightly EQed the audio, which turned out very well.
Alas, the best copies left of this talk seem to be 240p, but I fixed the aspect ratio, which was far too wide.  Hopefully a better master will surface someday.
